One of the greatest games by Valve, probably the reason why Valve doesn't make that many games anymore. However one of the greatest parts of Counter strike: global offensive is getting frags with the Pea-shooter. Awesome game, a must play.

Пожалуйста, опишите, что вам понравилось или не понравилось в этой игре, и порекомендовали бы вы её другим. Будьте вежливы и придерживайтесь правил и рекомендаций. Для отправки рекомендуется описание

As a man with over 1500 hours in this god forsaken game, I can say that this is not a game for everyone; and it's extremely toxic, very hard to master and very hard to find fun, unless. You like being curbstomped by better players until you become better. Also, since the game is free, cheaters are rampant and I have friends whos first competetive experience was with cheaters and the only experience they've ever had with CS:GO was with cheaters.

Ah, Counter-Strike: Global offensive. 

This game was ruined when they made it free to play. Valve thought that they would be able to cash in and compete against League fortnite, pubg etc. But instead people just flooded in with hacks and the threshold pay wall that kept most repeating hackers away disappeared. It's not rare to see people who spinbot in ranked, the prime system might be able to counter this, but all you need is another phone number which can easily be spoofed to yet again make an account and cheat. This is another example that Valve went from a company who cared about their products to a greedy corporation which tries to suck out your b pennies.  I hope this was helpful. 

If you want to trigger russians in casual this game is worth a shot, but if you want to attempt to climb and actually play the light in a serious competitive nature, you're better off playing something else.
